## CMSSW_7_5_X release cycle


# CMSSW_7_5_0_pre5
#### Changes since CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4...CMSSW_7_5_0_pre5

1. [9119](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9119)  from @mhwalker: New mixed triplet seed layers and updates to MVA selectors

1. [9223](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9223)  from @makortel: Transform VertexAssociatorByTracks to EDProduct style

1. [9225](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9225)  from @makortel: Sort the output of ClusterTPAssociationProducer

1. [9260](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9260)  from @VinInn: avoid relocation of SiStripCluster DetSetVector in case of onDemand

1. [9239](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9239)  from @slava77: Put some order in old MF configs; asymptotic default will be MagneticField_cff.py

1. [9218](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9218)  from @VinInn: fix for root5 in TrackBase

1. [9149](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9149)  from @mtosi: point seeded tracking regions

## CMSSW_7_5_X release cycle


# CMSSW_7_5_0_pre5
#### Changes since CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_5_0_pre4...CMSSW_7_5_0_pre5

1. [9197](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9197)  from @VinInn: Remove obsolete KalmanAlignmentAlgorithm

1. [9099](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9099)  from @makortel: Add protection againt NaNs for IP significance histograms in Tracking DQM

1. [9073](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9073)  from @VinInn: Add mask to keep track of all algos where a track is reconstructed (and also move detachedTripletStep right after initialStep in priority order where it should be) Class TkMCQuality is also modified to produce a vector of "qualities" instead of writing a new track collection with a fake quality bit set.

1. [9000](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9000)  from @makortel: Fix associationMapFilterValues() for empty input AssociationMap

1. [8996](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/8996)  from @appeltel: New HeavyIon ClusterCompatibility object and producer for beam scraping removal

1. [8988](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/8988)  from @makortel: Improve MultiTrackValidator performance
